entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 this afternoon then light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
